abstract: Chief executives and other corporate bosses are known for being big enthusiasts for the game of golf. It’s not unusual to hear about two C.E.O.s talking business on the greens — as the chiefs of Microsoft and Yahoo reportedly did last spring — or getting their latest golf scores posted on the Golf Handicap and Information Network.
lead_paragraph: Chief executives and other corporate bosses are known for being big enthusiasts for the game of golf. It’s not unusual to hear about two C.E.O.s talking business on the greens — as the chiefs of Microsoft and Yahoo reportedly did last spring — or getting their latest golf scores posted on the Golf Handicap and Information Network.
